Banner.Description: I have 2 years of experience developing systems, interfaces, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular, Dot net Core and SQL and sometimes in React applying good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 2 years as a developer, I seek to train every day. I have worked writing Angular, Dot net Core, and covering Fullstack developer roles with Angular, Dot Net Core and Sql.
My skills also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Angular Developer
Description: Working on CRM, Property Management, Owner Portal, and Tenant Portal projects.
Technology Used and Role: Angular, ASP.NET Core, Kendo UI, Angular Material, HTML, CSS, SCSS, Bootstrap
Developing dynamic frontend views using Angular and integrating APIs with ASP.NET Core backend.
Enhancing user experience by implementing advanced property management features, owner and tenant functionalities, and CRM integrations.
Responsible for building responsive, user-friendly interfaces and ensuring seamless communication between users and the backend.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Full Stack Developer (Angular + ASP.NET Core)

Technology Used and Role: Angular, ASP.NET Core, Kendo UI, Angular Material, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap
Making frontend view in Angular using above mentioned technologies
Making API integrations in Angular with ASP.NET backend
eSoftage web (eSoftage portfolio website):
Technology Used and Role: Angular, ASP.NET Core, Angular Material, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap
Made changes in frontend view in Angular using above mentioned frameworks
Added few new features using above mentioned technologies

Experience.Jobs.Title: Full Stack Developer (Angular + ASP.NET Core)

Made frontend view in Angular using above mentioned technologies
Made frontend view in Angular at pos.softaxe.com:555

Travel Agency web (https://sleepy-engelbart-ab1a31.netlify.app/):
Made this website in collaboration with Ammar Younus (my fellow)
Used similar technologies as in above projects

FeatureProjects.Title: Projects that I was a part of

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: CRM Property Management
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A specialized web-based CRM solution for managing properties and client relationships. This system integrates advanced property management features with CRM functionalities, allowing users to track property listings, client interactions, and service requests. Built with a modern, responsive frontend and secure API integration, it enhances operational efficiency for property managers.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Owner Portal
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A dedicated portal for property owners to efficiently manage their property assets. This platform allows owners to view property details, track rental income, monitor tenant requests, and receive real-time updates on property status. Built with user-friendly interfaces and secure access, the portal streamlines communication between property owners and managers while offering insights through analytics and reports.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Bizmate ERP
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A comprehensive ERP solution under development. This project involves creating robust frontend interfaces and seamless API integrations to enhance business operations.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Softaxe ERP Software
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A fully developed ERP software that streamlines various business processes, from inventory management to customer relations. Includes extensive reporting features and backend optimizations.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Business Portfolio Site
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A professional portfolio site for Softaxe, designed to showcase the company's projects and achievements. The site is optimized for performance and responsiveness.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Travel Agency Web
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A dynamic travel agency website that provides users with detailed travel packages and booking options. Developed with a focus on user experience and modern web standards.

OtherProjects.Title: More personal projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: E-COMMERCE WEBSITE
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Made frontend view using Angular Material, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap. Implemented Payment method, Integrations with backend, Added authentication pages with backend integrations.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Library Management
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Used Angular Material, Tailwind CSS, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap. Implemented integrations with backend.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Qoute App
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A single page Qoute app that has a minimal design, it genrates Qoutes on user interaction.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Tracking Web Application
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Made authentication pages, made integrations with PHP Laravel backend.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
